casebody.data:
KORNEGAY FAMILY FARMS, LLC, et al.
v.
CROSS CREEK SEED, INC. 187PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2016 Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Steven B. Epstein, Attorney at Law, Caitlin Goforth, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Cross Creek Seed, Inc. L. Neal Ellis, Jr., Attorney at Law, Wake Forest, J.P. Williamson, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Kornegay Family Farms, LLC, et al. Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of November 2016 by Defendant for Leave to File Record on Appeal:

*264"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of November 2016."
